abstract: BP’s exploration activity, the lifeblood of an oil company, came to a near halt after the Gulf of Mexico spill, but this year BP plans to drill 16 to 18 exploration wells, an executive said.
snippet: BP’s exploration activity, the lifeblood of an oil company, came to a near halt after the Gulf of Mexico spill, but this year BP plans to drill 16 to 18 exploration wells, an executive said.
lead_paragraph: BP is recovering from the paralysis that followed the 2010 Gulf of Mexico disaster, at least in terms of looking for more oil and gas. That was the message Friday from Mike Daly, the company’s executive vice president for exploration.

headline.print_headline: BP Plans to Restart Exploratory Drilling
